overview:
Francisco Guerrero, is the co-founder of Pintics and former VP of Marketing from the MotherKnows.com launching team. He founded SwapCash.com in 1999 and closed operations on 2001, having raised $300,000 in angel capital. He has over twelve years of experience in Direct/Digital Marketing, having worked at Harrah’s, HP, Intuit and Gap among others.

Previous to his startup experience, Francisco has worked in a variety of functions within Digital Marketing, from postal mail campaigns to database driven strategy and everywhere in between.

He is part of the first generation to graduate from the 2 yr. DMA’s Direct-Interactive Marketing Certificate at SJSU. Francisco has an MBA from Christian Brothers University in Memphis, TN. Francisco is currently Co-Founder and CEO of Pintics.com. Pintics is KissMetrics for Pinterest business users - Pintics provides Pinterest ‘power users’ with the tools and metrics needed to manage and optimize the traffic generated from their Pins.

Specialties Direct- Database Marketing, CRM Strategy, SEO, SEM, Acquisition, Retention, Strategy and Segmentation, Reporting, Analytics, Channel segmentation and coordination with all channels for customer acquisition. B2B and B2C marketing.
